name: TheHospitalityMarketingPodcast
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This skill is a weekly podcast up to 30 minutes that highlights the news that can effect your hospitality business, tools that come to market that can or should be used to generated more revenue, and case studies and techinques that offer insight on how to both use those tools but how others have done it or are doing it to generate even more revenue for your hospitality business. Whether you are a hotel, resort, flagged or independent. Restaurant, diner, food truck, chain or independent. we have something for everyone.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
